What I will do in the first year of my term: http://t.co/zuUShNgL #AgendaofChange # FH2012

I sign my book Change Fate at the Bookstore Le Failler, at #Rennes, before returning to the exhibition grounds! http://t.co/L3DMBBGL
More than 15,000 people at #Rennes for our big meeting, with @RoyalSegolene! To follow live on http://t.co/EaXM2v7g # FH2012
Today we give the keys of their definitive homes to 124 families of Rancagua and 146 more in Cauquenes. That is how we rebuild Chile.
It's a great and beautiful meeting tonight at #Rennes because @RoyalSegolene is here, the one who was our candidate in 2007. # FH2012
No candidate starts from nothing, he is the heir of a long history and mine is that of all the left. #Rennes # FH2012
We have 18 days to convince, to say that tomorrow we can not just win, but succeed for France! #Rennes # FH2012
The incumbent claims that he has changed, that he is another President, that he has learned, that he understands ... #Rennes # FH2012
He would prepare a measure on the driving license. That's good because the state driving license, the French are soon to take him away!
His project is his record, worse! #Rennes # FH2012
His project is the dismantling of labor law. #Rennes # FH2012
This European treaty renounces growth, employment, the very idea that Europe could be a project of prosperity. #Rennes # FH2012
His hidden project is the attack on the unions: these "troublemakers", these "impediments", these "bearers of placards". #Rennes # FH2012
The incumbent says he has changed. He has not changed his project or personality, and he will not change his behavior. #Rennes
Here is the candidate of the people ... supported by the French employers! #Rennes # FH2012
With you, with millions of women and men, we are fighting for our future to be different from our present. #Rennes # FH2012
I want to be the President of the recovery, the justice, the gathering, the youth of France. #Rennes # FH2012
My message is simple: we must change the future, change the policy, change the President. #Rennes # FH2012
Consistency is the condition of trust! #Rennes # FH2012
We must be ready to act, to change, to give confidence, and I tell you tonight at #Rennes, we are ready! # FH2012
The change will begin right away. #Rennes # FH2012
My first decision will be to compose a government, with a Prime Minister who will not be a collaborator but the leader of a team!
A team that will be composed of as many women as men! #Government #Rennes # FH2012
Control post at Rancho, km 85. To provide safety, road assistance and first aid. http://t.co/fl3ixp9e
I will announce at the NATO summit next May the withdrawal of French troops from Afghanistan. #Rennes #Agendaduchangement # FH2012
Solidarity is not the problem but the solution for Europe! #Rennes # FH2012
The next President will have one priority: youth! #Rennes # FH2012
We will introduce a social rating agency. An agency to note good behavior for larger companies. #Rennes
We will impose equal pay between women and men. #Rennes # FH2012
I will not make a new law. We must apply the laws of the Republic! #Security #Rennes # FH2012
The Court of Justice of the Republic will be abolished so that ministers are judged as citizens, because they are citizens!
We have made the commitment of the right to vote of foreigners in local elections! #Rennes # FH2012
We will ratify the Charter of Regional Languages! #Rennes # FH2012
We will share the gains of the growth, of the found activity. #Rennes # FH2012
There will be two major acts: a new act of decentralization, and the act of ecological transition, energetic. #Rennes # FH2012
Before May 6, there is April 22! I call on the French to vote massively in the first round for change! #Rennes # FH2012
Democracy is stronger than markets. The Republic is more powerful than finance. France is bigger than speculation.
I have the passion of the general interest, I have the love of my country. #Rennes # FH2012
My promise to you here at #Rennes is to give all my strength, all my energy to live up to your expectations. # FH2012
I call you to victory! We must go and look for her throughout the next few days! #Rennes # FH2012
Vote for victory, long live Brittany, and long live France! #Rennes # FH2012
I wanted to join in the 2nd hall of the exhibition park of #Rennes all those who could not enter the 1st! http://t.co/BPJ0cPHh
Continue, give me strength, let me win! #Rennes # FH2012 http://t.co/eSU8r5Js
We do not have an enemy on the left, our only opponent is the right, it's conservatism! #Rennes # FH2012
The whole of my speech tonight at #Rennes can be found here: http://t.co/3hHg9HC3 # FH2012
Hello my dear compatriots. We are boarding the plane at the "José Martí" Airport. We have completed the second cycle Radiotherapy.
Rolling on the track. South Course! "I feel your light and your aroma on my skin and the four in my heart" ... Viva Venezuela!
There we see General President Raúl Castro! Thanks Fidel! Thanks Raul! Thanks Cuba! We will live and we will win!
I will be at 7:40 am the morning guest of Canal +! # FH2012
New edition of the Prime Minister's newsletter - on the Youth Mental Health Project http://t.co/UzIG7Pn0

About Suriname Law: 'The law must have its course. If the court deems the suspects guilty they can not avoid their punishment '
Follow our live outdoor gathering at #Narbonne now: http://t.co/Kjnvf5Ow # FH2012
I only have one opponent: the right! #Narbonne # FH2012
We have to raise France, to raise the ambitions we carry, to raise the debate! #Narbonne # FH2012
When I say that I want to be Head of State, I add that I do not want to be head of everything, I leave this to others! #Narbonne # FH2012
The candidate-outgoing project? It's his record, but worse! #Narbonne # FH2012
If you meet people who do not want to pay a VAT increase in October, tell them to vote for us! #Narbonne # FH2012
There is no balance sheet assumed but there is a hidden project. #Narbonne # FH2012
My approach is one of consistency and consistency. #Narbonne # FH2012
By duty to the French, I wanted to explain the first months of my mandate http://t.co/zuUShNgL #Narbonne # FH2012
The left should not just win, move the country forward and then leave ... #Narbonne # FH2012
We demand the exercise of responsibility to transform France sustainably! #Narbonne # FH2012
The mission you entrusted to me, the duty that is mine is to win the left and advance France! #Narbonne # FH2012
@ mq_67 if you have proof that there was any tampering the judiciary were the place to go to for that.

@ SufwatHaddadin serious media analysis! Hired a grand suite! To receive close to the media and politicians with the aim of polishing. Salon home champion benefits !?
Following the conference of the candidate-out this afternoon, I answered many questions of the press: http://t.co/72S1ZH4c # Nîmes
@iivanovski. Thank you very much for hosting us and all the arrangements in which you lead..for BBC's work that was a success-btful country!
It is you who must bring the hope to build the France we want! # Nîmes # FH2012 http://t.co/7D7Aldd0
What honors a nation is that it is able to offer the next generation a better life. # Nimes # FH2012
On April 22, we will have definitively erased the specter of April 21, 2002! # Nimes # FH2012
How to meet at the Concorde when we were the President of the discord for 5 years ?! # Nimes # FH2012
I will go to the end and you will be with me to the end, in victory and in the recovery of France! # Nimes # FH2012
I am in Vaulx-en-Velin where #RadioHollande settled for the occasion. A live broadcast of now! http://t.co/EaXM2v7g

Today and tomorrow, I will be in the so-called popular neighborhoods, first in Vaulx-en-Velin and then in the Paris region. # FH2012
I am here in these neighborhoods to see what has been done and what remains to be done. # FH2012
To a journalist who asks me if I am tired, I answer that no and that what matters is not to tire the French! # FH2012
My point press, a few minutes ago, Vaulx-en-Velin is to listen here: http://t.co/oGtrfeU6 # FH2012
With @gerardcollomb, we take the measure of the transformation of Vaulx-en-Velin for a better social mix. http://t.co/XT70BB3U
From now on, we will talk about Vaulx-en-Velin for its success! cc @gerardcollomb http://t.co/HFEwbGwa
Today and tomorrow, I am and I will be in the so-called popular neighborhoods, to follow live here: http://t.co/F0K8LFuc # FH2012
Visit of the Mas du Taureau district in Vaulx-en-Velin, undergoing rehabilitation. http://t.co/bDtCmmDs

I start these 48 hours in abandoned neighborhoods here in Vaulx-en-Velin because it is here that began the history of the Ministry of the city.
Without a strong commitment to education, we will be living even harder than we have lived in our neighborhoods.
I am committed to you here in Vaulx-en-Velin: from the next school year we will strengthen the RASED. # FH2012
I propose that each high school in France can have a number of students who have access to preparatory classes. # FH2012
We must have a financing system that accompanies business creation. It will be the public investment bank.
Politics must allow everyone to have confidence, to have a relationship with the future that is that of hope # FH2012

@kasujja. How are you! I am well thank you. How is K'la?
I trust, all confidence, in the districts of the Republic! #Vaulx http://t.co/hFdPpZj5
You young people do not lose confidence, we come! #Vaulx # FH2012
We will end, once and for all, discrimination in hiring, and we will create the jobs of the future! #Vaulx # FH2012
I will create the generation contract that will allow the link in employment between young people and seniors. http://t.co/OkasjwEw #Vaulx # FH2012
In each public market there will be a close integration to hire neighborhood youth! #Vaulx # FH2012
There are no appearances in the Republic, only membership of the national community. #Vaulx # FH2012
I call you to vote massively on April 22! #Vaulx # FH2012
I feel great joy to lead this campaign! #Vaulx # FH2012
Do not allow suffrage to the far right: more stigma, contempt, divisions. #Vaulx # FH2012
We have known the tax hype: this is what we have known for 5 years, unless you are rich! #Vaulx # FH2012
To attack the unions is to attack the employees! #Vaulx # FH2012
When I see the candidate-outgoing boast, I say to myself: let's fight, nothing is done, nothing is acquired, nothing is won! #Vaulx # FH2012
Together, we will build another future for our country! #Vaulx # FH2012
